--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius heard the reply from the other bots, it sounded like they 
were
> going to destroy the base anyways. "I don't have enough power to 
operate the
> computer, how in the inferno blasted pit could I self destruct the 
stinking
> base, It's taking practically all the reserve power to keep the 
BLEEPING
> comm open to surrender to your  slagging troops. Besides if you cut 
through
> you'll be damaging the supplies in our upper supply depots." He 
hoped that
> the supplies would be more important than the risk.
> 
> Before the ship could respond a wave of fire struck the roof. 
blowing it to
> pieces sending it down into the control room on top of 
Ignatius. "Now that
> was just BRILLIANT, you tell me to come out then bury me alive." 
Ignatius
> had taken more abuse in this one day than he had dureing the entire 
war, He
> wanted more than anything to curl up in a lube bath and sleep for 
months.

Cyanide smirked as he watched the top of the trainers base get 
mangled and quickly flew into it via the hole. He looked around and 
then at Ignatius who was covered with metal before he opened fire on 
the metal around the bot with with acid beams from his hands.

Cyanide: "Now then fool... where is the rest of your crew? ANd what 
items do you have on this ship anyways that may be of use?"

Meanwhile Vile watched above as Drillbit made his escape and 
paitiently awaited the departure of the rest of the Predacons and 
Destrons.
